news.title: IBM to Acquire Confluent to Create Smart Data Platform for Enterprise Generative AI
news.summary: -	$11B acquisition to deliver end-to-end data platform for businesses to connect, process and govern data for applications and AI agents

news.title: Riyadh Air and IBM Partner to Launch World's First AI-Native Airline
news.summary: Riyadh Air’s AI‑powered operations create agility across the business and unify employee and guest experiences, setting a new benchmark in aviation
